Translations.Text: Sinna, ass n tnekra, a ten Idull, ad Yini: "anda ten icriken iW, i$ef temnamarem"? Nnan imawlan n tussna: "war ccekk, ddell akked ddens, assa, $ef ijehliyen
iwumi ddment lmalayek leowae, nitni densen iman nnsen". A d ssutren tifrat: "ur nexdim kra n tucmip". Xaii, Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Kecmet si tebbura, ar Loahennama; degs a pwekkoem. A yicmet uxxam imzuxiyen
Ad inin i wid ipeezziben: "d acu id Issers Mass nnwen"? A d inin: "d lxio". I wid imaanen, ise$ di ddunit agi. Pifxio, war ccekk, axxam aneggaru. Ay d umain uxxam n wid ipeezziben
Ad kecmen leonanat n Aaden, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen; degsen, i nitni, ayen i sen ihwan. Akka i Ipkafi Oebbi wid ipeezziben
wid iwumi ddment lmalayek leowae, nitni maanen, ad asen inint: "tifrat fellawen! Kecmet Loennet, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
Day a poaoun kan tisin n lmalayek $uosen, ne$ a d iawev lameo n Mass ik? Akka ay xedmen imezwura nnsen. Ur ten Idnis Oebbi, maca densen iman nnsen
D tucmitin xeddmen, i ten iwwten. Izzi yasen wayen i$ef pmmaaliken
